info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Berkshire, southern Bennington and western Windham Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Shaftsbury to near Florida. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Bennington, North Adams, Stratton, Adams, Williamstown, Pownal, Cheshire, Wilmington, Stamford, Readsboro, Florida, West Wardsboro, North Bennington, Whitingham, Dover, Marlboro, Wardsboro, Halifax, Woodford and Jacksonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
